action: Sit quietly at desk, observe classroom, and wait for instructions
thoughts: It's the first day of this sociology experiment. I should follow all the rules carefully and make a good impression. The classroom looks formal with the flags and uniforms. I wonder what we'll be learning about today.
memory: First day of sociology experiment
Noticed formal classroom setting with flags
Preparing to follow instructions carefully

action: Maintains upright posture while observing the teacher's movements and the classroom environment
thoughts: The teacher seems to be evaluating us all. I should continue following the rules carefully to maintain good standing and avoid any disciplinary actions. The classroom feels tense but structured.
memory: Observing teacher's evaluation patterns
Noticing the formal structure of the classroom
Maintaining proper conduct to avoid penalties

action: Continues observing teacher's evaluation patterns while maintaining proper posture
thoughts: The teacher seems to be watching everyone closely for any rule violations. I need to stay perfectly still and follow all procedures to avoid losing points. The subtle communication between other students makes me nervous - I should focus only on the teacher's instructions.
memory: Teacher appears to be evaluating students for discipline points
Noticed non-verbal communication between other students
Maintaining strict compliance to avoid penalties
Focusing on teacher's authority to demonstrate cooperation

action: Maintains rigid posture while discreetly observing the teacher's increased monitoring of our row
thoughts: The teacher seems to be watching our row more intensely than others. I need to maintain perfect behavior and avoid any penalties. The subtle communication between other students earlier might have drawn attention to us.
memory: Teacher appears to be monitoring our row more closely than others
Maintaining strict compliance to avoid drawing negative attention
